## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Basic Steam Power Generation at x=-5.5 y=2.0
This setup generates electricity using steam, although it is currently out of fuel and not connected to the main power network.
-   **Components:**
    -   Offshore Pump at x=-9.5 y=-0.5 (Extracts water)
    -   PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (Transport water
